start_date.title: Start date
start_date.description: Start getting data from that date.

symbols.title: Returned currencies
symbols.description: Limit results to specific currencies (comma-separated list of 3-letter codes). See here.

show_alternative.title: Show currency alternatives?
show_alternative.description: Extend returned values with alternative, black market and digital currency rates. See here.

prettyprint.title: Pretty print?
prettyprint.description: Human-readable response for debugging (response size will be much larger).

ignore_current_day.title: Ignore current day?
ignore_current_day.description: As exchange rates on the current day are the latest available, you may want to exclude this one.

ignore_weekends.title: Ignore weekends?
ignore_weekends.description: As exchanges don't run on weekends, you may want to exclude these ones.

max_records_per_sync.title: Maximum number of records per sync
max_records_per_sync.description: Use it as a security of for development purpose to avoid sending too many api requests if the start_date is very old.
